name: Marble Time Attack
description:
A game about marble racing in 3D

The game is about controling a marble ball and trying to finish the level in type shortest time possible.  For this you should learn which is the best way to use the Power Ups in your benefit.

controls: WASD for movement, SPACE for jumping.

Created by Carlota Blázquez, Ignacio Eguren, Lucia Encinas, Borja Ferrández y Marina Gutiérrez.
